original_text: Now this is the copy of the letter that the king Artaxerxes gave unto Ezra the priest, the scribe, even a scribe of the words of the commandments of the Lord, and of his statutes to Israel.
korean_text: 여호와의 계명의 말씀과 이스라엘에게 주신 율례 학자요 학자 겸 제사장인 에스라에게 아닥사스다 왕이 내린 조서의 초본은 아래와 같으니라

sentences.original_text: Now this is the copy of the letter
that king Artaxerxes gave unto Ezra
even a scribe of the words of the commandments of the Lord
and of his statutes to Israel
